# <type>: <subject>
##### Subject 50 characters ################# -> |


# Body Message
######## Allows multi-line, but no more than 4 lines. ############# -> |
######## 72 characters limit per line ############################# -> |

# Issue Tracker Number or URL

# --- COMMIT END ---
# Type can be
#   feat      : new feature
#   fix       : bug fix
#   refactor  : refactoring production code
#   perf      : enhancement performance
#   style     : formatting, missing semi colons, etc; (no production code change)
#   docs      : changes to documentation
#   test      : adding or refactoring tests; (no production code change)
#   chore     : updating grunt tasks etc; (no production code change)
#   ci        : update CI codes
#   build     : update code about build app such as CD workflows
#   revert    : abort changes, reset previous codes
# ------------------
# Remember me ~
#   Capitalize the subject line
#   
#   Use the imperative mood in the subject line
# 
#   Do not end the subject line with a period
# 
#   Separate subject from body with a blank line
#   
#   Use the body to explain what and why vs. how
#
#   Can use multiple lines with "-" for bullet points in body
#     
# ------------------
# this template is written by referring this documentation.
# @see: https://ujuc.github.io/2020/02/02/git-commit-message-template-man-deul-gi/
# ------------------
